name: laravel-agent
description: AI-powered Laravel development assistant - architecture decisions, code generation, testing, deployment, and more. 22 agents, 32 commands.

plugins.name: laravel-agent
plugins.description: Complete Laravel development assistant with 22 specialized agents for architecture, features, modules, services, APIs, testing, database, auth, Livewire, Filament, queues, AI/LLM, deployment, CI/CD, security, WebSockets, feature flags, migrations, code review, and git workflow automation
